miniapp.name: Beat Powell
miniapp.subtitle: Lower the Fed Rate
miniapp.description: Onchain game where you hit Jerome Powell to lower the Federal Reserve interest rate. Each hit drops it 0.01%, but Powell recovers +0.05% every hour!
miniapp.ogTitle: Beat Powell - Lower the Fed Rate Onchain
miniapp.ogDescription: Hit Jerome Powell to lower interest rates! Built on Base with Smart Wallets.
